analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate nava saṅkhitta sahajāta vāram pi pe pañhā vāram pi evam vitthāretabba

analyzed: kusalattika

original: 4.7.15.1. Sauttarapada
analyzed: sa auttarapada

analyzed: akusalam sauttaram ca abyākatam sauttarañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Kusalo sauttaro dhammo kusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

analyzed: akusalaḥ sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

analyzed: abyākataḥ sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

analyzed: hetuyā satta ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate terasa saṅkhitta

original: 4.7.15.2. Anuttarapada
analyzed: an uttara pada

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Kusalaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam anuttaram dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam anuttaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke eka avigate dve saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

analyzed: abyākataḥ anuttaraḥ dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā tīṇi anantare dve pe avigate dve

analyzed: kusalattika saraṇaduka

analyzed: akusalam saraṇam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

analyzed: abyākatam araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ araṇañca abyākataṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

analyzed: kusalam araṇam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā

analyzed: abyākatam araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalaḥ araṇaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri,
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca anantare samanantare cattāri

original: sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte
analyzed: sahajāte pañca aññamaññe dve nissaye satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte

original: āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve,
analyzed: āsevane dve kamme cattāri vipāke eka āhāre pe magge cattāri sampayutte dve

original: vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate satta saṅkhitta

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam
